description: This file defines the application state management class AppState for a Flutter-based language learning app. It includes vocabulary and phrase data, user preference management, and quiz functionality, utilizing ChangeNotifier for state updates.

classes.name: AppState
classes.description: Manages vocabulary, phrases, user favorites, learned items, and quiz state for the language learning application. It extends ChangeNotifier to notify UI components about state updates.

methods.name: AppState
methods.description: Constructor initializing state, generating quiz questions, and loading user preferences.

methods.name: _init
methods.description: Asynchronous initialization method that loads preferences and initializes the quiz.

methods.name: _save
methods.description: Saves current favorites and learned sets to SharedPreferences.

methods.name: toggleFavorite
methods.description: Toggles the favorite status of a vocabulary item by id.

methods.name: toggleLearned
methods.description: Toggles the learned status of a vocabulary item by id.

methods.name: restartQuiz
methods.description: Resets quiz state and generates new quiz questions.

methods.name: answer
methods.description: Records an answer to the current quiz question and updates the score if correct.

methods.name: nextQuestion
methods.description: Advances to the next quiz question.

methods.name: currentQuestion
methods.description: Returns the current quiz question for display.

methods.name: _generateQuiz
methods.description: Generates a list of multiple-choice quiz questions based on vocabulary data.
